%title /ab/rule-types/{ruleTypeId} GET 获取指定的RuleType

=/ab/rule-types/{ruleTypeId} GET=
%toc

==功能 ==
查询指定的 `RuleType` 信息

==URL==
/ab/rule-types/{code}

==HTTP请求方式==
GET

==请求参数==

=== 路径参数 ===
| 参数名 | 值     | 描述                       |
|--------|--------|----------------------------|
| code   | 数字型 | 要查询的 `RuleType` 的code |


==返回格式==
JSON XML

==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl -Hacccept:application/xml https://baseurl/ab/rule-types/6
curl -Hacccept:application/json https://baseurl/ab/rule-types/6
  }}}

==返回结果==

===XML Reslut ===
{{{ class="brush:xml"
    <ruleType>
        <url>http://localhost:8080/ab-service/rule-types/1</url>
        <code>PERCENT</code>
        <description>group the user by percent.</description>
    </ruleType>
  }}}
=== Json Reslut ===
{{{ class="brush:js"
        {
            "url": "http://localhost:8080/ab-service/rule-types/1",
            "code": "PERCENT",
            "description": "group the user by percent."
        }
  }}}
